author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kaap Agri Bedryf Employee And Farm Worker Bee Trust Updates On Acquisition
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - Kaap Agri Bedryf Employee and Farm Worker Bee Trust:
* ‍ACQUISITION NOT PROCEEDING​ * ‍REMAINING CONDITIONS FOR DEAL TO ACQUIRE THREE RETAIL FUEL OPERATIONS PRECEDENT WERE NOT FULFILLED BY MARCH 30​
* DEAL TO BUY ‍THREE RETAIL FUEL OPERATIONS, SITUATED IN GAUTENG AND IN LIMPOPO WILL NOT BE PROCEEDING ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
